title: The Elopement of the Princess and the Lady Knight - Novel Updates
tags: Different Social Status   Knights   Marriage of Convenience   Royalty   Short Story
author: イシミヤ
description:
The Princess is secretly in love with the Lady Knight.

However, the Princess’ Mother does not know about them and tries to use her daughter as a political pawn.

The Princess who is to be married elopes with the Lady Knight…

It’s an extremely chaotic Yuri fantasy romance.>
